ai-tha-ap357:1.2_0: I cut off the bamboo pole.
ai-tha-ap357:1.3_0: Going on the bank of the riverbank
ai-tha-ap357:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap357:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap357:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Daṇḍaka.
ai-tha-ap357:6.1_0: a leader with a senior monk who,
